name: web-build-boilerplate-npm
description: Boilerplate package for building web projects

scripts.sass: node-sass --source-map true --output-style expanded --indent-type spaces --indent-width 2 -o css/ scss/
scripts.sass-autoprefixer: npm run sass && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.mkdir-p: mkdirp dist/css -p && mkdirp dist/js -p && mkdirp dist/img -p
scripts.cp-r: cpr fonts dist/fonts && cpr libs dist/libs
scripts.dist-prep: npm run rm-rf && npm run mkdir-p && npm run cp-r
scripts.minify: npm run minify:html && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:img
scripts.build: npm run dist-prep && npm run sass-autoprefixer && npm run minify
scripts.browse:build: npm run build && npm run browse:dist
scripts.postinstall: npm run build && npm run edit && npm run watch

author: Tomasz Grande
